title: LoopOnly Discord Bot

cover.alt: Music note encompassed by looping arrows.

summary: LoopOnly is a Discord Bot I made to loop one song continuously.
long_summary: LoopOnly is a Discord Bot I made to loop one song continuously. Created since lots of music bots were going offline for legal reasons, and to simplify the commands as much as possible for my use case.

gallery.alt: The LoopOnly bot says, "Playing your song!"
gallery.caption: The bot is friendly!
